title: Alec Baldwin Says He Didn’t Pull the Trigger in Fatal ‘Rust’ Shooting
sub_head: ‘I would never point a gun at anyone and pull the trigger at them, never,’ actor says
body:
Actor Alec Baldwin said he didn’t pull the trigger of the gun that killed a cinematographer and wounded the director on the set of the Western film “Rust.”
“The trigger wasn’t pulled,” Mr. Baldwin said in an ABC News interview with George Stephanopoulos, according to excerpts released Wednesday. “I didn’t pull the trigger.”
